front.title: Using Identity as Raw Public Key in Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS)

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of identity as a raw public key in Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS). The TLS protocol procedures are kept unchanged, but cipher suites are extended to support Identity-based signature (IBS). The example OID tables in the [RFC 7250] are expanded with OIDs specific to IBS algorithms.
